pain_points: Inconsistent quality in handmade items affecting brand reputation
Difficulty sourcing high-quality, durable yarn materials
Challenge of adapting to fast-changing resort wear trends
High Minimum Order Quantities (MOQs) from traditional manufacturers
Ethical concerns regarding artisan wages and working conditions

faqs.question: What is the minimum order quantity (MOQ) for boho resort wear?
faqs.answer: Our MOQ starts at 100 pieces per style, allowing boutiques to test new designs with reasonable inventory.

faqs.question: Do you offer private label services for resort collections?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide full private label services including custom tags, labels, and packaging to match your brand identity.

faqs.question: Are your crochet materials sustainable?
faqs.answer: We prioritize eco-friendly materials like organic cotton and bamboo blends, perfect for conscious resort wear brands.

pain_points: Finding unique, stand-out designs that aren't mass-produced
Ensuring durability for active festival environments
Sourcing breathable materials for hot summer events
Quick turnaround times for festival season restocks
Balancing competitive pricing with ethical labor practices

faqs.question: Are your crochet tops suitable for hot weather?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We use breathable cotton and open-stitch designs specifically engineered for comfort in summer festival heat.

faqs.question: Can I customize colors for specific festival themes?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a wide range of vibrant and neon colors, including UV-reactive yarns for rave collections.

faqs.question: What are the popular styles for the upcoming festival season?
faqs.answer: Trending styles include halter tops, micro-minis, and bell-sleeve crop tops with fringe details.

pain_points: Fabrics that don't dry quickly or lose shape when wet
Limited size inclusivity in standard wholesale options
Lack of versatile designs that transition from beach to bar
Seasonal inventory management and lead times
Finding high-end, luxury look at wholesale prices

faqs.question: Do your cover-ups hold their shape when wet?
faqs.answer: We use premium acrylic-cotton blends that maintain shape and dry faster than traditional 100% cotton options.

faqs.question: What sizes do you offer for beach cover-ups?
faqs.answer: We offer inclusive sizing from XS to 3XL to cater to a diverse range of body types.

faqs.question: Can these be worn as casual wear beyond the beach?
faqs.answer: Yes, our designs are versatile enough to be styled as tunics or summer dresses for resort dining and casual outings.

pain_points: Authenticity of 'handmade' look in mass-produced items
Sourcing soft, natural fibers that fit the aesthetic
Finding intricate floral and nature-inspired patterns
Ensuring ethical production aligns with slow fashion values
Consistency in complex stitch patterns like lace and cables

faqs.question: Is your cottagecore collection truly handmade?
faqs.answer: Our pieces are high-quality imitation crochet that perfectly captures the authentic, rustic charm of handmade items while ensuring durability and consistency.

faqs.question: What materials do you use for this collection?
faqs.answer: We focus on natural fibers like soft cotton, linen blends, and wool to perfectly match the cottagecore aesthetic.

faqs.question: Do you offer custom floral embroidery?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can add custom 3D floral appliqu√©s and embroidery to cardigans and tops.

pain_points: Capturing the specific 'retro-futuristic' Y2K vibe accurately
Quality of granny square joins (unraveling issues)
Sourcing bright, pop-culture relevant colors
Speed to market for viral TikTok trends
Balancing nostalgia with modern fit and comfort

faqs.question: Are your granny squares securely joined?
faqs.answer: We use a reinforced joining technique to ensure durability and prevent unraveling, even with active wear.

faqs.question: Do you follow current TikTok fashion trends?
faqs.answer: Our design team actively monitors social media trends to release viral-ready styles like balaclavas and shrugs.

faqs.question: Can I mix and match colors for a custom palette?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! The Y2K aesthetic is all about color. You can customize yarn color combinations for any design.

pain_points: Competing with big-box retailers on price and design
Finding unique items that aren't on Amazon/Shein
Managing inventory risk with high MOQs
Lack of exclusivity in wholesale designs
Poor communication and reliability of overseas suppliers

faqs.question: Do you sell to Amazon sellers?
faqs.answer: No, we focus on partnering with independent boutiques to maintain brand exclusivity and value.

faqs.question: Can I get exclusivity on certain designs for my area?
faqs.answer: We offer territory exclusivity for large volume orders to help your boutique stand out.

faqs.question: What is your typical turnaround time for boutique orders?
faqs.answer: In-stock items ship within 48 hours. Custom small-batch orders typically take 2-3 weeks.

pain_points: High barrier to entry due to massive MOQs
Lack of control over quality and production process
Intellectual property theft and design copying
Communication barriers with offshore manufacturers
Hidden costs in sampling and shipping

faqs.question: What is your process for protecting my designs?
faqs.answer: We sign strict NDAs and have internal protocols to ensure your unique designs are never shared or reproduced.

faqs.question: Do you provide samples before full production?
faqs.answer: Yes, we require sample approval for every order to ensure the fit, yarn, and quality meet your exact standards.

faqs.question: Can you handle custom branding and packaging?
faqs.answer: We offer a full suite of branding services, including woven labels, hang tags, and custom poly mailers.

pain_points: Stocking the right trends at the right time (timing is key)
Finding knitwear that isn't too hot for summer
Balancing trendiness with timeless summer staples
Supply chain delays causing missed seasonal windows
Inventory management for short summer seasons

faqs.question: When should I order for the Summer collection?
faqs.answer: We recommend placing orders by January/February to ensure delivery for the start of the season in April/May.

faqs.question: Are your summer knits breathable?
faqs.answer: Yes, we specialize in loose-gauge crochet and cotton/linen blends designed specifically for maximum airflow.

faqs.question: Do you offer restocks during the season?
faqs.answer: We keep a buffer stock of best-sellers for quick mid-season replenishment.
